text:
Privacy Policy



Meetgeek may collect, store and process various kinds of data, with different legal grounds, as listed below.

This policy describes what information we collect when you use Meetgeek's site, services, products, and content ("Services").
We receive information from you and other third-parties that helps us approximate your location.
If you contact us, we may use your Account, Transaction or Usage Information to respond.
Meetgeek logs activities by you and other users when the users interact with our websites or apps, when a page or a room is visited or where there is a conversation.

Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when Websites or Services are accessed or used and record it in log files.
This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.

Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when Websites or Services are accessed or used and record it in log files.
This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.
We may, for example, use a business address submitted by your employer, or an IP address received from your browser or device to determine approximate location.
Meetgeek uses the collected data for various purposes:

Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when Websites or Services are accessed or used and record it in log files.
This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.
We will fetch and store email address, name and profile image URL from this service.
Meetgeek may also collect location information from devices in accordance with the consent process provided by your device.

We will only collect and process information that we need to deliver the service to you, and to continue to maintain and develop the service.

We may process information that you choose to share with us if you participate in a focus group, research interview, contest, activity or event, apply for a job, interact with our social media accounts or otherwise communicate with Meetgeek
We may process information that you provide to us for the purpose of subscribing to our email newsletters.
We may process information that you send to us, should you choose to submit a ticket to our customer support.

Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when Websites or Services are accessed or used and record it in log files.
This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.
We may, for example, use a business address submitted by your employer, or an IP address received from your browser or device to determine approximate location.

Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when Websites or Services are accessed or used and record it in log files.
This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.

This policy applies to Meetgeek's online meeting recording & transcription tool, including the website and web applications, and other Meetgeek websites (collectively "the Websites"), as well as other interaction (e.g. customer support conversations, user surveys and interviews etc.) you may have with Meetgeek.
When you as a user interact with the Services, we collect and process metadata to provide additional context about the way the Service is being used.

In the case where we are involved in a merger, acquisition, bankruptcy, reorganization or sale of assets such that your information would be transferred or become subject to a different privacy policy, we will notify you in advance and give you the option to delete your data before the transfer.
We will fetch and store email address, name and profile image URL from this service.

In addition, we limit access to your personal data to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know.
They will only process your personal data on our instructions and they are subject to a duty of confidentiality.

Regardless of the provisions above, we may retain your personal data where such retention is necessary for compliance with a legal obligation to which we are subject, or in order to protect your vital interests or the vital interests of another natural person.
